question.title: How to get the return value from a JobRunR Job?
question.body:
I am currently looking at and testing the JobRunR library. I have now been able to start a job and read out the status. Everything actually looks very good. But now there are also jobs that produce a return. How can I get this value again?

Can anyone give me a tip on how to solve this?

Example Job start:

JobId jobId = BackgroundJob.enqueue(() -> String result = this.controller.generatePreview(date));

I need result
